example.parse: (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يسر) (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN_PROP بول) (NOUN_PROP غلام)) (CONJ و) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC زوجت) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))) (NP (NOUN_PROP ميشلين)))) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3MD+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:D_MOOD:SJ يعلنا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN لأهل) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاصدقاء))) (PP-CLR (PREP عن) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN ولادة) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN شقيق)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN_PROP ايلي))))) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MD سميا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ-2 (NP (PVSUFF_DO:3MS ه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1))) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-2)) (NP-PRD (NOUN_PROP ديمتري)))))))

arg.g: the birth of a sibling to Elias, they called Dimitri

example.arg: عن ولادة شقيق لايلي سميا ه ديمتري
